hero.subtitle: A open-source Move application stack that provides a comprehensive toolkit for building verifiable decentralized applications (DApps) and fully on-chain applications.

features.title: Features
features.mainTitle: The Move Stack with Limitless Potential

moveCompatible.title: 100% Move-Compatible
moveCompatible.description: Use the existing Move ecosystem to your advantage.

zeroGas.title: zero gas fees
zeroGas.description: Allows project cover this expense, supporting flexible expansion and customisation.

unlimited.title: Unlimited
unlimited.subtitle: Transactions per second
unlimited.description: Depends on the number of dubhe channels running in parallel.

community.title: Community
community.mainTitle: Join the global community behind Dubhe
community.description: With a thriving community of developers worldwide, Dubhe is backed by passionate supporters driving the future of Move blockchain technology. Connect, collaborate, and grow with us as we shape the next generation of decentralized solutions.

hero.title: Supporting the growth of the Dubhe Ecosystem
hero.subtitle: Through developer support, ecosystem initiatives, and decentralization efforts, the Dubhe Foundation helps foster the growth and adoption of the Dubhe protocol's ecosystem.

developerSupport.title: Developer Support
developerSupport.description: Providing grants, resources, and mentorship to developers building on the Dubhe ecosystem. From hackathons to long-term project funding.

ecosystemGrowth.title: Ecosystem Growth
ecosystemGrowth.description: Strategic partnerships and initiatives to expand the Dubhe ecosystem. Building bridges between different Move chains and protocols.

decentralization.title: Decentralization
decentralization.description: Ensuring the Dubhe Ecosystem remains truly decentralized through governance, community involvement, and distributed decision-making processes.

hero.title: Meet the Dubhe Foundation Team
hero.description: Our diverse, global team of engineers, researchers, and community builders is dedicated to advancing the Move ecosystem and empowering developers worldwide.

leadership.title: Leadership Team
leadership.description: Meet the visionaries and experts leading Dubhe's mission to revolutionize Move development

join.title: Join Our Team
join.description: We're always looking for talented individuals passionate about advancing blockchain technology
join.ctaDescription: Contact us about available positions and opportunities

engineering.title: Engineering
engineering.description: Building the future of Move development tools and infrastructure

research.title: Research
research.description: Exploring cutting-edge blockchain technologies and protocols

community.title: Community
community.description: Growing and supporting our global developer community

partnerships.title: Partnerships
partnerships.description: Building strategic relationships across the blockchain ecosystem

hero.title: Fund Your Innovation
hero.description: Receive non-repayable grants from Dubhe Foundation to build open-source Move applications, infrastructure, and tools. All projects must be fully functional and complete all milestones.

infrastructure.title: Infrastructure Grants
infrastructure.description: Build core infrastructure, developer tools, and ecosystem utilities

dapp.title: DApp Development
dapp.description: Create innovative decentralized applications on Dubhe ecosystem

research.title: Research Grants
research.description: Academic research, protocol improvements, and theoretical contributions

community.title: Community Projects
community.description: Education, documentation, community tools, and outreach programs

process.title: Application Process
process.description: Simple 5-step process to get your project funded

proposal.title: Proposal Submission
proposal.description: Submit comprehensive proposal with detailed milestones and open-source commitment

review.title: Foundation Review
review.description: Dubhe Foundation technical committee evaluates feasibility and ecosystem impact

interview.title: Team Interview
interview.description: Present your project roadmap and demonstrate technical capabilities

approval.title: Grant Approval
approval.description: Foundation board approves non-repayable grant with milestone requirements

delivery.title: Milestone Delivery
delivery.description: Complete all milestones with functional deliverables and receive full grant

requirements.title: Application Requirements
items: Experienced team with proven development track record
Fully functional deliverables - no prototypes or demos
Strong alignment with Dubhe ecosystem growth goals

successStories.title: Success Stories
successStories.description: Projects that received grants and made significant impact

nonRepayable.title: Non-Repayable Grant
nonRepayable.description: All grants are unconditional donations from Dubhe Foundation. No repayment required upon successful milestone completion.

openSource.title: Open Source Required
openSource.description: All funded projects must be released under MIT or Apache 2.0 license. Complete source code must be publicly available.

completion.title: Full Milestone Completion
completion.description: Projects must deliver fully functional, production-ready software. All milestones must be completed to receive the full grant.

finalCta.title: Ready to Build Open Source?
finalCta.description: Apply for a Foundation grant and contribute to the open-source Dubhe ecosystem

notFound.title: Page Not Found
notFound.description: The page you're looking for doesn't exist or has been moved.
notFound.suggestion: Don't worry, let's get you back on track.

serverError.title: Server Error
serverError.description: Something went wrong on our end.
serverError.suggestion: Our team has been notified and is working on a fix.

unauthorized.title: Authentication Required
unauthorized.description: You need to sign in to access this page.
unauthorized.suggestion: Please log in with your credentials.

forbidden.title: Access Forbidden
forbidden.description: You don't have permission to access this resource.
forbidden.suggestion: Please check your credentials or contact an administrator.

rateLimited.title: Too Many Requests
rateLimited.description: You're making requests too quickly. Please slow down.
rateLimited.suggestion: Wait a few moments before trying again.

serviceUnavailable.title: Service Unavailable
serviceUnavailable.suggestion: We'll be back online shortly. Thanks for your patience!

badGateway.title: Bad Gateway
badGateway.description: There's a problem with our server connection.
badGateway.suggestion: This is usually temporary. Please try again in a few moments.
